oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA): Sustainable Organic Vegetable Systems Network
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A network of 10 farms with organic field vegetable production, agronomic and economic performance monitored, on-farm innovation supported and documented (DEFRA OF 0340).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} HDRA: Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA): Sustainable Organic Vegetable Systems Network. Facility Leader(s): Rosenfeldt, A, Henry Doubleday Research Association.
